summary:
Recoloured dialogue menu for mod [  EZ2C Dialogue Menu  ] by steve40
PL - w modyfikacji dzialaja polskie litery.
descriptionHtml:
THIS IS A SETUP FOR MODIFICATION that you need to first download here [ http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18466 ] --- EZ2C Dialogue Menu --- (upload by steve40 thx, good job)

IMPORTANT - Remember to first install the original mod

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
PL - w modyfikacji dzialaja polskie litery.
Pamietaj by najpierw zainstalowac oryginalnego moda, link wyzej.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

As I have original modifications (steve40) and do not necessarily want to get yourself to have fun in the settings I can set you will like it :)

Settings are as follows:
- Of course, working all available languages ??in the game.
- Caller name of the compass at the top (the color violet hue)
- New dialogues colors (orange hue)
- Colors already spoken dialogues (blue hue)
- Selects issues are also brightens and is incremented font size for better readability.

In the package are 2 options of font (default) the game, and the font (Handwritten Skyrim)
All the colors are so chosen that were not neither too pale nor too bright ...

MY OTHER MODS
(music sounds and effects for skyrim) ---------- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27447
(textures for dungeons) --------------------------- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25910
(textures for caves) -------------------------------- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25768
author: vito74m
